name: Global uniques
unitUniques: [This Unit] gains the [Healer Heal] status for [3] turn(s) <upon turn end> <when adjacent to a [Healer Buff] unit> <for units without [Healer Heal]>
[This Unit] heals [5] HP <upon turn end> <when adjacent to a [Herb Medic] unit>
[This Unit] gains the [Poisoned] promotion <when adjacent to a [Poisoner] unit> <when defending> <upon damaging a [All] unit>
Instantly gain [1] [Blood God Favor] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarian]] unit>
[This Unit] gains the [Frozen] status for [2] turn(s) <upon damaging a [Age Of Frost] unit>
[This Unit] gains the [Burnt] status for [2] turn(s) <upon damaging a [Burnt] unit>
